price: 18. C’est Lui Qui, de haut, domine Ses serviteurs, et c’est Lui le Sage, le parfaitement Informé.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
